title: [Skin] Super Galaxy Rumble: Overheat Auto Attack Visual Bug
body:
This was addressed back in September but the bug is back.

When Rumble Overheats with the Super galaxy Rumble skin his drill no longer turns hot/red and does the special auto attack animations. At all. Try it out. He just uses his normal auto attacking animations without the exaggerated squash and stretch animations on the drill. I would love this to be fixed since its one of the most satisfying parts of the legendary skin.

Bug: (The drill stays grey, small, doesn't perform the special squashing/stretching animations)
http://i.imgur.com/HyCNMdn.png

What it's **supposed** to look like: 
http://i.imgur.com/uuR2Xy2.png
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYE_aH7Nvbs#t=114

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're investigating!
